name: Digital Pet Thermometer for Accurate Fever Detection, Suitable for Cats/Dogs/Horse/Veterinarian, Waterproof Pet Thermometer, Fast and Accurate Measurements in 20 Seconds (Pink)
short_description: FAST AND ACCURATE - This thermometer gives the temperature in only 20 seconds. Our tried-and-true thermometer will give you accurate results without keeping you waiting.
COMFORTABLE FOR YOUR PET - The thermometer can be used for pets and is designed to be comfortable with a flexible tip, making it soft and gentle to use.
EASY TO CLEAN - The thermometer is easy to clean and waterproof. Clean with water or soapy water after each use.
ERROR RANGE-The thermometer has an accuracy of +/-0.1C between 95℉ and 107℉, otherwise +/-0.2℉

LO DOESN'T MEAN LOW BATTERY - When you turn on your pet thermometer, the screen might show "Lo". The "Lo" means the ambient temperature is not between 32℃/89.6℉ and 42.9℃/109.2℉. You can still go ahead and measure your pets temperature.
PROMPT:Only for pets and animals, for non medical diagnosis.

name: ADC Adtemp 422 Veterinary Thermometer, Dual Scale
short_description: EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN: The Adtemp 422 is the world’s first digital stick thermometer designed for veterinary applications. The special housing with lanyard attachment allows for easier removal (lanyard not included).

FAST, RELIABLE RESULTS: Accurately measures body temperature in animals in about 10 seconds. Meets the accuracy requirements for intermittent thermometers under ASTM E1112 and is backed by a 2-year warranty.
EASY TO USE: Compact ergonomic design with large, easy-to-read display; measures 5.25 inches long, weighs 0.47 oz.

FEATURE RICH: Measurement range of 90°F to 109.9°F ±.2°F (32.0°C - 43.9°C ±.1°C), with audible tone when measurement is complete. Auto-off function conserves battery life. Includes clear plastic storage cover. Replaceable 1.55V (LR41) coin-type battery for up to 5,000 measurements. Boxed unit includes five probe sheaths.

TRUSTED ADTEMP BRAND: In business since 1984, ADC offers one of the largest selections of cost-effective digital stick and non-contact thermometers. Our selection and New-York based quality control set us apart from other manufacturers.
product_description: Product Description ADC’s Adtemp 422 is the first digital stick thermometer designed for veterinary applications. The 422 offers a dual scale with a range of 90°F - 111.9°F ±.2°F (32.0°C - 43.9°C ±.1°C) and meets the accuracy requirements for intermittent thermometers under ASTM E1112. The unit features a specially designed housing with lanyard attachment for enhanced removal. A replaceable 1.55V (LR41) coin-type battery, good for up to 1,500 measurements, is included, along with an integral carry case and five probe sheaths Manufacturer Contact Information 1-800-232-2670

name: Reptile Thermometer and Humidity Gauge,2PCS Digital Hygrometer Adhesive Reptile Terrarium Hydrometer,Bearded Dragon Tank Accessories,Pet Humidity Meter Supplies for Leopard Crested Gecko,Snake,Lizard
short_description: Precision Health Guardian: Your reptile pets are very sensitive to temperature and humidity, and small changes can affect their comfort and even their health. This humidity thermometer utilizes a built-in high-precision measurement chip that monitors the environment with 0.9°F accuracy, ensuring you are always aware of the actual conditions in your animal's tank. It's not just a matter of caring, it's a consideration for your pet's long-term health.

Comprehensive Monitoring Experience: With the purchase of this kit, you will receive two humidity thermometers that can monitor multiple areas of your reptile tank or multiple containers at the same time. This gives you a more comprehensive view and control over the environmental status of your entire ecosystem without having to invest in additional monitoring equipment.

Easy to Read and Operate: The LED screen clearly displays the temperature, making it easy to read, day or night, even in dimly lit rooms. In addition, the simple design of the quick switching function between ℉ and ℃ makes it easy for users with different habits to use and adjust according to their needs.

Easy to Install: With the help of the included double-sided adhesive, you can fix the humidity thermometer in any ideal position in seconds without complicated tools or tedious steps. The cordless design avoids cumbersome wiring and keeps your animal tank environment neat and undisturbed.

Energy Efficient and Reliable: This product supports replacement battery power, eliminating the financial burden and waste of resources that comes with frequently purchasing new equipment. Meanwhile, the durable construction and design ensure the long-term stable operation of the product, which is more friendly and economical than other single-use products.
Package includes:Includes 2 thermometers to share with siblings and best friends, perfect accessory for reptiles. If there is any problem, you can contact us, we will deal with it within 24 hours.

name: Vicks SpeedRead Digital Thermometer for Baby, Kids & Adults, Color-Coded Readings, Oral, Baby Rectal Thermometer or Under The Arm, Water Resistant
short_description: A century of powerful relief: At Vicks, we believe everyone deserves a touch of care; you can rely on our line of digital thermometer for adults, kids and babies to provide quick, accurate results when you need them most
Versatile: With an 8-second result, it’s ideal as an adult thermometer while also serving infants, toddlers, and kids; SpeedRead works orally, rectally, or under the arm as digital baby thermometers

Quick, accurate results: This Vicks Thermometer provides accurate, simple readings in only 8 seconds, so you can get results quickly; this oral thermometer also has a memory feature that recalls and displays last temperature taken

Easy to read infant thermometer: The color coded Fever InSight helps you understand temperature readings at a glance; a green display suggests a normal temperature, yellow is an elevated temperature and red is a high temperature

Special Features: Vicks digital thermometers are water resistant for easy, thorough cleaning, and have an automatic shut-off for longer battery life; plus, it includes a battery and has a limited 1 year warranty
product_description: Get fast, accurate temperature readings when you need them most with the Vicks SpeedRead Digital Thermometer (V912US). Designed for the whole family, this digital thermometer delivers results in just 8 seconds with ±0.2°F accuracy. The Fever InSight® color-coded display makes it easy to interpret temperatures at a glance: green indicates normal, yellow signals a mild elevation, and red alerts to a high fever. Because it can be used as an oral thermometer for adults as well as a rectal thermometer for babies or even used under the arm for toddlers and kids, it’s perfect for the whole family. This thermometer for kids and adults also has a memory feature that recalls and displays last temperature taken, an automatic shut-off for longer battery life and is waterproof for easy, thorough cleaning. FSA/HSA eligible and backed by a 1-year limited warranty, the Vicks SpeedRead is a fast, reliable thermometer you can count on.

name: Braun ThermoScan 7 Digital Ear Thermometer for Adults, Babies & Infants, Age-Adjusted Fever Guidance, No. 1 Brand Recommended by Pediatricians
short_description: Easy to use: Featuring a pre-warmed tip and infrared technology, this baby thermometer for infants takes temperatures instantly and can be used comfortably; the ExactTemp system uses a light and beep to confirm proper positioning in the ear

Most recommended thermometer by Pediatricians(1): When checking for a fever at home, use this digital thermometer for kids & adults; Braun ThermoScan 7 is clinically proven as accurate as a rectal thermometer for babies(2)

Quick results: Get results in seconds with the ThermoScan 7 Braun digital thermometer; this ear thermometer for adults and kids uses Age Precision Technology for age-adjustable fever guidance; easily interpret results with color-coded display

Sanitary sharing: It’s not just a baby thermometer for infants, this gentle Braun thermometer can be used for the whole family; the disposable ear thermometer covers/lens filters make sharing sanitary

A brand you can rely on: Pediatricians rely on Braun digital, forehead and no contact thermometers, and you can, too; your family’s health is of the utmost importance, and Braun makes thermometers you can trust
product_description: When checking for a fever at home, you want accurate and reliable results, quickly. The Braun ThermoScan 7 delivers. It’s an easy to use digital thermometer for adults and kids that features Age Precision Technology for age-adjustable fever guidance, and color-coded display for an easy interpretation of results. Unlike other ear temperature thermometers, where the cool tip of the thermometer in the ear may result in lower temperatures, this digital thermometer features a pre-warmed tip that ensures accurate temperature readings. It’s an accurate thermometer for adults that measures in Celsius and Fahrenheit. This in ear thermometer also features infrared technology that takes a temperature in seconds, and is gentle, so it’s a great choice for the entire family. The ExactTemp system in this ear thermometer for kids and adults uses a light and beep to confirm proper positioning, so you can be confident it’s being used correctly. Use it as a digital baby ear thermometer, toddler thermometer and even as an adult thermometer. The disposable lens filters of these digital thermometers keep sharing sanitary. Disclaimers: 1) Based on survey reporting that of surveyed pediatricians who recommend a brand of thermometers, Braun is the most recommended. 2) Loveys AA, Dutko-Fioravanti I, Eberly SW, Powell, KR. Comparison of ear to rectal temperature measurements in infants and toddlers Clinical Pediatrics, Volume: 38 Issue: 8, page(s): 463-466. 1999.
